Author: bitchmittz
Text: I feel you. I'm a trans guy and my chest is the #1 source of my self-hatred and disordered eating. Testosterone has made it shrink significantly which helps a lot, but it's still pretty bad. Also I really need to lose weight because the smaller my chest gets, the better my surgery results will be. I stg this surgery will save my fucking life (and in more ways than one), yet my family still considers it cosmetic.

Author: AspieEdwin
Text: Same.. I started fitness to relief gender dysphoria and it helps Now I still obsess over food and weight but less, And I'm absolutely obsessed with my excersize  I've not recovered but I've shifted (trying to recover tough) And it helped
